Summary: Very large orange= moved fast south to north
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Warren
There were no other sightings in Warren on or around July 17th 1972
divs: Sighting DetailsStanding in the driveway early morning,It just got light out, noticed orange glowing ball moving from south to north, no sound, no flashing lights. Seemed very strange and never will forget it, Kinda bothers me till this day.
